levels.description: Attack Interval <@ba.vdown>increases</>, attack changes into summoning meteorites from the sky; Meteorites take a while to fall down, dealing <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage to enemies in a large area and <$ba.stun>Stunning</> all hit targets for <@ba.vup>{attack@stun}</> seconds
